documents.content: Allows native usage of ModelScope based Text To Video Models in ComfyUI
documents.subject: ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V

questions.question: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: The node allows native usage of ModelScope based Text To Video models in ComfyUI.

questions.question: How do I get started using the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: Clone the repository, create a text2video folder in the models directory, and download the required models.

questions.question: Which models are compatible with the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: Models that were converted to A1111 format are compatible.

questions.question: Where can I find the required models for the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: The provided link leads to the ModelScope and ZeroScope models.

questions.question: How do I use the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: Provide the path to the ModelScope model and any desired configuration options.

questions.question: What are some tips for using the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: Use the ResAdapter LoRA for better quality at lower resolutions. Consider using a higher CFG value for better coherence.

questions.question: What are the TODO items related to the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: Unconditional guidance and ensemble of 1.5 models are currently not implemented.

questions.question: Where can I find more information about the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
questions.answer: The provided text includes attribution links to the ModelScope team and relevant resources.
